Articles.Content:
When "include stock craft" setting is turned on, My saved craft list is filled with ships (With Parts) from mods i don't have anymore, i.e. Mostly RN Soviet Rockets, Spacecraft, Stock Spacex Vecicles, Not the mod name).

I have deleted Any trace of these mods in my files, but they keep coming back, even with the mods uninstalled,

I do have CKAN, so maybe that has something to do with it?

Please send help!

Did you maybe save some your own crafts in the <your KSP installation>\Ships\VAB folder instead of the respective folder <your KSP installation>\saves\<your career name>\Ships ?

The former contains the crafts which are enabled/disabled via the option "include stock craft".

2 hours ago, kerbalk said:

I have deleted Any trace of these mods in my files, but they keep coming back, even with the mods uninstalled,

Are you on Steam? Maybe you have Cloud Saving Enabled? I doubt it but sometimes it causes problems, try disabling it.

Edited January 3, 2021 by Boyster

2 hours ago, VoidSquid said:

Did you maybe save some your own crafts in the <your KSP installation>\Ships\VAB folder instead of the respective folder <your KSP installation>\saves\<your career name>\Ships ?

The former contains the crafts which are enabled/disabled via the option "include stock craft".

I have searched keywords for all the crafts, in my ksp folder, and deleted all, if not a noticable amount. as far as i know, they shouldn't be on my pc, i did not save them, they came with the mods, pre-assembled, ready to use with the "include stock craft" checked in the pre world gen options. They are not in the ladder, even as im looking at them in my crafts ingame.

Edited January 3, 2021 by kerbalk

8 minutes ago, kerbalk said:

I have searched keywords for all the crafts, in my ksp folder, and deleted all, if not a noticable amount. as far as i know, they shouldn't be on my pc, i did not save them, they came with the mods, pre-assembled, ready to use with the "include stock craft" checked in the pre world gen options. They are not in the ladder, even as im looking at them in my crafts ingame.

I don't know if it will help but if you are on Steam you can delete all of them and just verify files, or else, dunno i have these pictures of all the stock, maybe it will help you,

https://imgur.com/a/OuMs18X

8 minutes ago, Boyster said:

Are you on Steam? Maybe you have Cloud Saving Enabled? I doubt it but sometimes it causes problems, try disabling it.

I just tried that, it seemed to have worked, but I've had the option off for a while so I don't know if time will change that, so I'll let you know if it works in a few days or weeks.

Just now, Boyster said:

I don't know if it will help but if you are on Steam you can delete all of them and just verify files, or else, dunno i have these pictures of all the stock, maybe it will help you,

https://imgur.com/a/OuMs18X

Also, its been happening ever since i got these mods, and since then I've changed versions, un/reinstalled the game, but that doesn't work.

10 minutes ago, kerbalk said:

Also, its been happening ever since i got these mods, and since then I've changed versions, un/reinstalled the game, but that doesn't work.

Um i am kinda rusty on things but it feels to me it has something to with the Steam Workshop thing, inside the game when you select that, or Ckan i guess.
